heroText.title: Secure and interactive
heroText.subtitle: for your future projects
heroText.description: Safely store and manage your future project and application ideas with an easy and interactive interface. Never lose a great idea again.

features.title: Store and Manage Your Ideas with Ease
features.description: Our platform provides a secure and interactive environment for you to store and manage your future project and application ideas. With an easy-to-use and robust features, you'll never lose a great idea again.

cards.title: Interactive Interface
cards.description: Our user-friendly interface makes it easy to add, manage, and organize your ideas. Drag and drop functionality allows you to prioritize your ideas as you see fit.

cards.title: Secure Storage
cards.description: Your ideas are stored securely in our database. You can rest assured knowing that your future project and application ideas are safe and sound.

cards.title: No Third Parties
cards.description: We respect your privacy. Your ideas are yours and yours alone. We do not share your data with any third parties.

loginPage.invalidPassword: Password should include at least 6 characters
